headline: Cuomo Lays Out Agenda: Marijuana, Gun Control and Foam Food Containers
abstract: Legalizing the drug would pour hundreds of millions into the coffers of a state facing a $6 billion budget gap, he said.
lead_paragraph: ALBANY, N.Y. â€” Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo vowed on Wednesday to legalize marijuana in New York, prioritizing a push that fell apart last year amid tensions over who should be allowed to sell the drug and where the revenue should go.
